projects.name: Limit Order Book & Matching Engine
projects.description: FIFO matching engine with cache-line alignment, data-oriented design, and hot-path allocation elimination via slab memory pools.

projects.name: HFT Execution Simulator
projects.description: Event-driven backtesting framework with deterministic microsecond-resolution replay and lock-free SPSC ring buffers.

projects.name: Arena-Based Vector Library
projects.description: Custom arena allocator and dynamic vector with bump-pointer allocation for zero-fragmentation memory management.

projects.name: MEDICO - Medical Diagnostic System
projects.description: Multi-agent AI diagnostic pipeline using ensemble LLM reasoning with Neo4j knowledge graph for explainable inference.

projects.name: Service Telemetry Monitor
projects.description: Real-time service health monitoring dashboard with async polling, Discord webhook alerting, and latency visualization.

projects.name: Scinterweb Analytics Platform
projects.description: Production analytics frontend with real-time charting, user session management, and responsive dashboards.

_instructions.how_to_add: Copy a project object, update the fields, and increment the id. Then run 'node generate-projects.js' to rebuild the HTML.

fields.name: Project title
fields.featured: true = show on homepage, false = projects page only
